title: My Old Mill, Sovereign, EPDG HOFer Want List:
author: Luke

posts.post_title: My Old Mill, Sovereign, EPDG HOFer Want List:
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I'm working on the first two series of HOFers, and trying to keep the ratio of non-Pied/SC backs high.  Looking to buy these in primarily lower grades:

Old Mill:
Marquard hands at sides
Flick
Wallace
Waddell throwing
Davis
Bender portrait
Willis
Matty portrait
Matty white cap
Lajoie portrait
Lajoie throwing
Joss portrait
Jennings portrait
Keeler portrait
Keeler batting
Griffith portrait
Evers portrait
Crawford throwing
Chesbro
M. Brown portrait

Sovereign:
Waddell portrait 350
Wallace 150
Chance red portrait 150
McGraw portrait no cap 150
Crawford throwing 350 

EPDG:
Chance red portrait

Let me know if you have any available.  Thanks for looking!

Evers Cubs (blue sky) with the OLD MILL back is an impossible front / back combo.

So, scratch that one off your OLD MILL want list.


TED Z
.
Looking to buy, and have some cool trade stuff as well.
